thread.section_title: Frame My TV Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frame My TV | framemytv.com
thread.title: David Phillips
thread.title_full: Frame My TV reviewed by David Phillips

author: David Phillips
title: David Phillips
text: While building a new home, I was able to involve Frame My TV early in the process which was a big help. As we progressed to interior finishes they referred us to a talented artist named Karen Sperling, who created the perfect picture for our great room. Since our great room is our main living space it allows it to function in two unique ways. We love our art and how easy it is to watch tv whenever we might want to. Visitors to our home just can't believe there's a tv behind the art!
